import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, OnInit, Output } from '@angular/core';
import { Anime, animeToList, StatusAnime } from 'src/app/interfaces';
import { ModalserviceService } from '../../services/modalservice.service';
import { StatusService } from '../../services/status.service';
import { AnimeService } from '../../services/anime.service';
import { RatingAnime } from '../../interfaces';
import { RatingService } from '../../services/rating.service';


@Component({
  selector: 'app-animemodal',
  templateUrl: './animemodal.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./animemodal.component.scss']
})
export class AnimemodalComponent implements OnInit {

  @Input() anime: Anime
  public status: StatusAnime
  public rating: RatingAnime
  public animeToList: animeToList;
  public statusDB: HTMLSelectElement;
  public ratingDB: HTMLSelectElement
  @Output() modalClose: EventEmitter<boolean> = new EventEmitter()
  constructor(public modalService: ModalserviceService, private statusService: StatusService, private animeService: AnimeService, private ratingService: RatingService) { }

  ngOnInit(): void {

  }

  save() {
    this.statusDB = document.getElementById("selectStatus") as HTMLSelectElement;
    this.ratingDB = document.getElementById("selectRating") as HTMLSelectElement;
    console.log(this.ratingDB.value);
    this.status = {
      animeId: this.anime._id,
      status: this.statusDB.value,
      userId: localStorage.getItem("user")
    }

    this.statusService.setOrUpdateAnimeStatus(this.status).subscribe(resp => {
      console.log(resp);
    })

    this.rating = {
      animeId: this.anime._id,
      userId: localStorage.getItem("user"),
      rating: parseInt(this.ratingDB.value)
    }

    this.ratingService.setOrUpdateAnimeRating(this.rating).subscribe(resp => {
      console.log(resp);
    })

    this.animeToList = {
      animeId: this.anime._id,
      userId: localStorage.getItem("user")
    }
    this.animeService.addAnimeToList(this.animeToList).subscribe(resp => {
      console.log(resp);
    })
    this.ratingService.calculateAverage(this.anime._id).subscribe(resp => {
      this.modalService.openCloseModalAnime();
    })
  }


}

<div class="myModal" *ngIf="anime._id" [class.myModal]="!modalService.showModalAnime">

    <div class="modal" tabindex="-1" role="dialog" style="display: block;">
        <div class="modal-dialog" role="document">
            <div class="modal-content">
                <div class="modal-header">
                    <h5 class="modal-title">{{anime.title}}</h5>
                    <button type="button" class="close" (click)="modalService.openCloseModalAnime()" data-dismiss="modal"
                        aria-label="Close">
                        <span aria-hidden="true">&times;</span>
                    </button>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-body">
                    <div class="row">
                        <div class="col-4">
                            <img class="img card-img" src="{{anime.picture | noImage}}" alt="...">
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-8">
                            <div class="card-body">
                                <h2 class="card-title">Rating: {{anime.rating | number:'.1-1'}}  <i class="fas fa-star"></i></h2>
                                <p></p>
                                <div style="display: inline-block;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="col-md-6">
                                            <select [(ngModel)]="anime.statusUser" class="custom-select"
                                                id="selectStatus">
                                                <option selected value="" disabled>-</option>
                                                <option  value="Pwatch">Plan to watch</option>
                                                <option  value="watching">Watching</option>
                                                <option  value="completed">Completed</option>
                                                <option  value="hold">On hold</option>
                                                <option  value="dropped">Dropped</option>
                                            </select>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="col-md-6">
                                            <select class="custom-select" [(ngModel)]="anime.ratingUser"
                                                id="selectRating">
                                                <option selected value="0">(0) Failure</option>
                                                <option  value="1">(1) Appalling</option>
                                                <option  value="2">(2) Horrible</option>
                                                <option  value="3">(3) Very Bad</option>
                                                <option  value="4">(4) Bad</option>
                                                <option  value="5">(5) Average</option>
                                                <option  value="6">(6) Fine</option>
                                                <option  value="7">(7) Good</option>
                                                <option  value="8">(8) Very Good</option>
                                                <option  value="9">(9) Great</option>
                                                <option  value="10">(10) Masterpiece</option>
                                            </select>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-footer">
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-none btn-s" (click)="save()">Save</button>
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-none btn-c" (click)="modalService.openCloseModalAnime()"
                        data-dismiss="modal">Close</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

./animemodal.component.scss 

@import "../../../assets/variables.scss";

.myModal{
    display: none;
}

.modal-header{
    background-color: $background-pink;
}

.modal-title{
    font-family: bokuNoHero;
    font-size: x-large;
}

.card-title{
    font-family: bokuNoHero;
    font-size: x-large;
}

.modal-body, .modal-footer{
    border-top: 2px solid $dark-blue;
    background-color: $background-blue;
}



.btn{
    font-family: bokuNoHero;
}

.btn-s{
    background-color: $dark-blue;
}

.btn-s:hover{
    background-color: $light-blue;
}
.btn-c:hover{
    background-color: $light-pink;
}

.btn-c{
    background-color: $dark-pink;
}

.fa-star{
    color: $dark-pink;
}
